entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
